price: سپاهیان آسمان‌ها و زمین از آنِ الله است؛ و الله شکست‌ناپذیرِ حکیم است.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
